content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":77732,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8e279f21-bd66-43b3-8dfa-a1f895f6f7d2/Recognition.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/8e279f21-bd66-43b3-8dfa-a1f895f6f7d2/Recognition.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Recognition.png\",\"name\":\"Recognition.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"8e279f21-bd66-43b3-8dfa-a1f895f6f7d2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":569,\"height\":320},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Motivated employees perform at their best and are highly productive. This is one of the factors that helps the company to achieve its business goals. Hence, motivating and inspiring people is an important part of people management practices.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You, as a manager, will need to understand what motivates your team members and how you can manage their motivation effectively. Use your 1-on-1 sessions with your reports to understand their motivation and feel free to ask your dedicated People Partner/Advisor for help here, too.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Recognition is an important part of the employee motivation process. It helps people feel more valued, shows their contribution to the project/unit/company success, and, as a result, makes the team more engaged. Recognition is positive feedback on a person's contribution, reflecting not just on work performance, but also personal dedication and engagement on a regular or ad hoc basis. It can be expressed formally or informally, individually or collectively, privately or publicly, and monetarily or non-monetarily.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What can you do as a manager?   \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Be a \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"role model\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Leadership modeling the recognition behaviors is the most effective way to communicate to everyone that this is important, and it is the behavior to follow. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Recognize\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" your team\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your recognition has the highest importance for employees. You are the ones who have access to the most important information on your reports - and you are in the right position to give immediate, spontaneous positive feedback.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Be specific\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"People especially value the feedback that captures their efforts/results. Try to use the PAR technique (problem-action-result) and tell a coherent story of what exactly they’re being recognized for.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When to recognize?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Recognition is a continuous process. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Recognition ideally happens regularly throughout the whole employee’s journey in the company and be consistently incorporated into day-to-day
